module.exports = {
  validateArgs: {
    paths: {
        '/foo': {
            get: {
                parameters: [
                    {
                        in: 'query',
                        name: 'foo',
                        schema: {
                            type: 'string',
                        },
                        required: true,
                    },
                ],
            }
        }
    },
  },
  request: {
    path: 'foo',
    query: {
      foo: 'asdf',
      additional1: 'bbbbb',
    }
  },
  requestOpts: {
    strictQueryParamValidation: false
  }
};
